nodes.text: Clan Awaud was a Mandalorian clan that splintered during the Clone Wars, with the splinter faction of Clan Awaud was part of the Old Mandalorians and was based on Vlemoth Port. It was led by Chieftain Nam Beroya until his supposed death, and was succeeded by his adoptive daughter, Vera Beroya.

Clan Awaud allied themselves with the residents of Foundry Four on Xorrn and sympathizers of the Alliance to Restore the Republic, and fought against the Galactic Empire in the Battle of Xorrn. The clan led a battalion of 800 Mandalorian warriors from Vlemoth Port alone, as other warriors were out on missions.
